Title: Meeting Jinzhou: A Visit to Mahe's Grocery
Text: Every morning, well before the sun graces the sky, Mahe, the owner of Mahe's Grocery, has already begun his work. Over the next few hours, he carefully prepares the ingredients for today's sale. With changing seasons come distinct selections of vegetables and fruits. How does Mahe choose seasonal ingredients, and how does he ensure them reaches households far and wide? Join us today on "Meeting Jinzhou", as this episode takes you on a visit to Mahe's Grocery.
